original_text: (The people of Athens liked to talk about new ideas. So did the foreign people who lived there. They all wanted to hear new things and to talk about them. They seemed to do this all the time.)
korean_text: 모든 아덴 사람과 거기서 나그네 된 외국인들이 가장 새로운 것을 말하고 듣는 것 이외에는 달리 시간을 쓰지 않음이더라

sentences.original_text: The people of Athens liked to talk about new ideas
sentences.korean_translation: 아테네 사람들은 새로운 아이디어에 대해 이야기하는 것을 좋아했습니다

sentences.original_text: So did the foreign people who lived there
They all wanted to hear new things
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 모두 새로운 것들을 듣고 싶어했습니다

sentences.original_text: They seemed to do this all the time
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 언제나 이런 일을 하는 것처럼 보였습니다
